::Spears::

She looked at Prebon, smiling. "If you want, we could let the 
prisoner go with hs memory intact.  Think of the pain." She kissed 
his cheek again. "Think of other things as well."  She gently brought 
her hand up to Prebon's chin and turned his face towards hers. She 
smiled and closed her eyes. She kissed him and gently rubbed his 
cheek with her hand while she kissed him.  She then pulled back and 
smiled at him,"Think of other things," then she whispered,"My master."
